releases.name: 0.0.1-alpha
releases.notesHtml:
• Added Features
  1. Documents
  • Store Request Data
  • Stores Response Data
  • Stores javascripts
  • Stores css styles
  1. Browser
  • Extension of the RestSharp RestClient
  • Generates Docuements for each web request.
  1. Javascript Engine
  • Used by the browser to scrape css styles from inline styles and linked styles.
  1. StyleEngine
  • Used by browser to scrape JavaScript content from inline scripts and externally linked scripts.

releases.name: 0.0.2-alpha
releases.notesHtml:
• Added Features
    Reworked browser entirely, no longer extends rest sharp client. Unit tests are passing for all Browser methods with the exception of the post methods. These will be tested before the next release.
    This version should be used over all previous releases, future versions will be backward compatible with this version.
  1. Documents
  • Store Request Data
  • Stores Response Data
  • Stores javascripts
  • Stores css styles
  1. Browser
  • Utilizes the RestSharp RestClient
  • Generates Docuements for each web request.
  • Supports asynchronous and synchronous
  1. Javascript Engine
  • Used by the browser to scrape css styles from inline styles and linked styles.
  • Scraping logic is implemented for asynchronous and synchronous browser requests
  1. StyleEngine
  • Used by browser to scrape JavaScript content from inline scripts and externally linked scripts.
  • Scraping logic is implemented for asynchronous and synchronous browser requests

1. Documents
  • Store Request Data
  • Stores Response Data
  • Stores javascripts
  • Stores css styles
  1. Browser
  • Supports asynchronous and synchronous web requests
  • Generates Documents for each web request.
  1. Javascript Engine
  • Used by browser to scrape JavaScript content from inline scripts and externally linked scripts.
  1. StyleEngine
  • Used by the browser to scrape css styles from inline styles and linked styles.

releases.name: 0.0.3-alpha
releases.notesHtml:
• Added convenience methods
  • Submit methods for post requests
  • Navigate methods for get requests
  • Updated browser initialization
  • Updated browser to initialize cookie container by default for automatic cookie management.

releases.name: 0.0.3-beta
releases.notesHtml:
• Added additional convenience methods
  • Submit methods for post requests
  • Added ability to set request headers
  • Added ability to add form data, sent as get request
  • Navigate methods for get requests
  • Added ability to set request headers

• Added convenience methods
  • Submit methods for post requests
  • Navigate methods for get requests
  • Added inline XML documentation for all files
    API Documentation can now be found at https://jayx239.github.io/BrowseSharp/

releases.name: 0.0.4-alpha
releases.notesHtml:
• Added Browse History Management Methods
  • Clear Histroy
  • Back
  • Forward
  • Set max history size
  • Updated Navigate and Submit methods to manage history
  • Note: Standard web request methods do not manage history currently, if you want history management to work properly stick to using the navigate and submit methods
  • Added the ability to disable javascript scraping and style scraping

releases.name: 0.0.4-beta
releases.notesHtml:
0.0.4-beta:

  • Added request uri to Document object.
  • Fixed bug with history management methods where request uri was not being set properly causing the previous url to be used in the request.
